headline: Fortinet and Crime Stoppers International Launch Global Cybercrime Bounty Program
summary: First-of-its-kind initiative incentivizes deterrence and disruption of cybercrime through anonymous tips and rewardsSUNNYVALE, Calif., Nov. 18, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- News Summary Fortinet® (NASDAQ: FTNT), the global cybersecurity leader driving the convergence of networking and security, and Crime Stoppers International (CSI), the world’s only global crime reporting platform, today announced the launch of a global partnership and pioneering Cybercrime Bounty program. The partnership with CSI
